title: Stardust
description:
FAME HAS ITS PRICE—AND ITS PASSIONS...C.C. McCarty: He burst upon the rock-and-roll scene with sudden heat of a comet. A poor Dallas boy from the wrong side of the track, he had the talent—and the looks—to make it to the top. Soon he had everything…the women, the money, the fame. And the danger.Valentina Trent: The voluptuous, ruthless owner of Bluebonnet Records had tried and failed to manipulate C.C. into a contract and into her bed. Now a woman scorned, she vowed to destroy him and all he held dear.Laura Kay McCarty: She'd inherited C.C.'s talent, his magnetism…and his enemies. It was up to her to pick up the pieces of her daddy's legend and show the world that she, too, had been sprinkled with the elusive, magical 
Stardust
.
author: Nan Ryan
